Class Tamagotchi

java.lang.Object
Tamagotchi
public class Tamagotchi extends Object
Represents a virtual pet in the Tamagotchi Simulator program. A Tamagotchi has attributes like age, hunger, satisfaction, and a name. It requires care through feeding and petting to stay happy and alive.

  • Method Details

    • getAge

      public float getAge()

    • getHunger

      public int getHunger()

    • getSatisfaction

      public int getSatisfaction()

    • setNull

      public void setNull()
      Sets the Tamagotchi's attributes to null or 0.

    • giveCookie

      public int[] giveCookie(int cookies)
      Feeds the Tamagotchi the specified number of cookies. Reduces hunger but also decreases satisfaction slightly.
      Parameters:
      cookies - The number of cookies to feed
      Returns:
      An array containing the number of cookies eaten, current hunger, and current satisfaction

    • pet

      public int[] pet(int pets)
      Pets the Tamagotchi the specified number of times. Increases satisfaction and reduces hunger slightly.
      Parameters:
      pets - The number of times to pet
      Returns:
      An array containing the number of pets given and current satisfaction

    • passTime

      public void passTime()
      Simulates the passage of time for the Tamagotchi. Increases age, hunger, and decreases satisfaction.

    • dead

      public boolean dead()
      Checks if the Tamagotchi is dead based on hunger or satisfaction levels.
      Returns:
      True if the Tamagotchi is dead, false otherwise

    • overfed

      public boolean overfed()
      Checks if the Tamagotchi is overfed.
      Returns:
      True if the Tamagotchi is overfed, false otherwise

    • underfed

      public boolean underfed()
      Checks if the Tamagotchi is underfed.
      Returns:
      True if the Tamagotchi is underfed, false otherwise

    • happinessStatus

      public String happinessStatus()
      Determines the Tamagotchi's current happiness status based on satisfaction, hunger, and thresholds.
      Returns:
      String representation of the happiness status (HAPPY or SAD)

    • viewStatus

      public void viewStatus()
      Displays the Tamagotchi's current status including name, age, hunger, satisfaction, and happiness status.

    • simulateLife

      public void simulateLife()

    • isDead

      public void isDead()
      Monitors the Tamagotchi's life in a separate thread. This method checks if the Tamagotchi is dead and prints a message if it is.
